it_services.name: Cloud Computing
it_services.description: Provides on-demand computing resources over the internet, including storage, processing power, and applications.

it_services.name: Network Security
it_services.description: Ensures the security and integrity of an organization's network infrastructure, protecting against unauthorized access and cyber threats.

it_services.name: Data Backup and Recovery
it_services.description: Offers solutions for regularly backing up and recovering data to prevent data loss in case of system failures or disasters.

it_services.name: Managed IT Support
it_services.description: Outsources IT support services to a third-party provider to handle maintenance, troubleshooting, and technical assistance.

it_services.name: Data Analytics
it_services.description: Utilizes statistical analysis and computational techniques to interpret and analyze data, providing valuable insights for decision-making.

it_services.name: Cybersecurity Consulting
it_services.description: Provides expert advice and services to organizations on how to strengthen their security posture and protect against cyber threats.

it_services.name: Mobile App Development
it_services.description: Designs and develops applications for mobile devices, catering to various platforms such as iOS and Android.

it_services.name: IT Infrastructure Management
it_services.description: Manages and oversees an organization's entire IT infrastructure, including servers, networks, and hardware components.

it_services.name: Business Continuity Planning
it_services.description: Develops strategies and plans to ensure that essential business functions can continue during and after a disaster or disruption.

it_services.name: Virtualization Services
it_services.description: Enables the creation of virtual versions of IT infrastructure components, optimizing resource utilization and improving scalability.
